name: space (itch) (Beatriz.Beatriz)
description:
In the year 2900, a spaceship with the intention of going to another galaxy, ended up lost in space. Now she needs to find out where she is.

Controls: Space to start, R for explosion, space to shoot.

 ↓-walk down

→- walk to the right

←-walk to the left

↑-walk up
